review: Not really what I expected. Apple TV much better. Chromecast very limited apps. You can only use youtube and Netflix in my country
author: HERMANN SEIDEL

review: Google Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player.  Google Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player  Audio and video not insync with each other.
author: Dennis Kirkey

review: When are you going to add the computer as a source of material that can be streamed?  Can you add Flixter?Thank you.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Couldn't get it to stream itunes and the software was clunky and slow. The Apple tv box is wayyyyy better and it's 80 bucks!
author: andrew macdonald

review: Bought for son in law and he loves it, so much easier he said to watch movies etc. instead of watching from a computer.Kim from Clarkston
author: Kim

review: very few things work with this device. Plus it has several issues, I either get sound and no image of image and no sound.Google needs to work out their issues.
author: Paulo

review: The device arrived almost immediately /2 days after ordering!/.Installation was only 5 minutes, then the device started it's hard life as a streaming 'pump'. Even the firmware update was a simple and quick operation. Using ChromeCast is really as simple as pressing a button /even switching the TV set to the appropriate input source requires more buttons/.
author: Gabor Borjan

review: Works fine, easy to set-up and use. Would though ask for more APP's to use. All in all I've had a very good experience with the Chromecast.
author: Michael Helm

review: It works as promise and easy installation!You can watch Netflix and control  it from you tablet or phone.great !!
author: Frans

review: Love it, I highly recommend this product. I can watch YouTube videos, Netflix, etc right from my TV using my cell phone!
author: Michelle Mazzucco
